title: Stay Inside the 9s
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Randy Schroeder
itunes:summary:
One of the worst things you can do is try to have a serious conversation with your spouse when one or both of you is tired. It might be that you need to set some rules for when you discuss heavy topics. John, Greg and Erin share how setting boundaries on when to have difficult conversations is beneficial to a marriage. Featuring Dr. Randy Schroeder.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the book "Simple Habits for Marital Happiness" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-07-05?recd=1450401

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcasst/stay-inside-the-9s/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/simple-habits-to-embrace-in-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1450401

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
